# INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptionsResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result that adds a temporal event trigger.

## Declaration

```swift
class INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptionsResolutionResult
```

## Overview

You return an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptionsResolutionResult] object when resolving parameters containing an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptions] value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter.

For additional resolution operators, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves successfully matching the specified parameter.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to confirm the value before proceeding.

## Event Triggers

- **INSpatialEventTrigger**: A trigger condition based on the user’s arrival or departure from a given location.
- **INTemporalEventTrigger**: A trigger condition based on a date or time.
- **INDayOfWeekOptions**: Days of the week.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
